heading: Derelict Lodge Dungeon Guide
content: Derelict Lodge is a long and annoying dungeon due to Search the Slain Villagers objective. Still, it contains the powerful and can offer some good Renown for first completion. We don't recommend doing it more than once, so finish this one and move on to greener pastures. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
